BRIEF-Bounty Mining Updates On Loan Facility Agreement With Amaroo Blackdown Investments Sept 27 (Reuters) - Bounty Mining Ltd : * UPDATES ON LOAN FACILITY AGREEMENT WITH ITS MAJOR SHAREHOLDER AMAROO BLACKDOWN INVESTMENTS * RECEIVED A LETTER FROM AMAROO NOTIFYING BOUNTY OF EVENT OF DEFAULT
